---
title: Leverage Technology Resources
author: ''
date: '2022-11-16'
slug: leverage_technology_resources
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $767.7K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Leverage Technology Resources. The average
  contract duration was 2.06 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $368.4K. The longest
  contract was 6.5 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.1M.
lookup_name: 'LEVERAGE TECHNOLOGY RESOURCES'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '767.7K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '18'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '7'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '39%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '352%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2.71'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '3.9M'
s424_mean_duration: '2.06'
s421_mean_contract_value: '368.4K'
s425_max_duration: '6.5'
s422_max_contract_value: '1.1M'
---
